(I will prevail.  'Cause I'm listening to the TF:TM soundtrack :P, then I'm 
gonna watch the movie, and I'll be sure to attack during the greatest moments 
for the Decepticons...ie the death of Op Prime, Starscream's brief moment as 
the Emperor of the Decepticon Empire, and the death of Ultra Magnus!  
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA...CD's more than halfway done and I ain't done with this post 
yet...)

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares/Unitron/Nemesis Enforcer:





Dark One swooped down, ast he missiles were being fired, one still heading 
towards him though since he hadn't gone down far enough.  A button pressed 
inward in his cockpit, two flares launching from the back of his form, 
intercepting the missile and causing it to pre-emptively explode, the 
shockwave sending Dark One spinning, though he regained his composure with a 
burnt engine.

---

Breakdown laughed as shrapnel impacted Hot Rod's back.  He stopped laughing 
when he saw two rockets heading for him.  He couldn't do anything.  His 
artillery mode was rather slow.  He just braced for impact, flipping onto a 
side as a few of Torca's shots impacting with him, but he barely noticed.

After leaving a 'dent' in the ground, Breakdown slowly transformed to his 
biped mode, climbing to his feet angry and firing off a grenade from his 
grenade launcher at Torca.

---

Pyro drove forward full speed, firing off a single fire ball at Sky Lynx.

---

Hiss charged the Cybertronian Fire as an explosion ripped a hole in the side 
of the once proud looking warship.  Once, Hiss was scared of it.  Slag, just 
about everyone he knew of was afraid of the gargantuan machine of death.  But 
he wasn't anymore.  

He jumped to the side, an EMP blast hitting the grass next to him.  He raised 
his fusion cannon, firing off two blasts, blowing apart an EMP cannon. 

---

Scavenger transformed into his HUMV mode, driving forward at 80 MPH, firing 
off twenty shells from each cannon, forty shells in all heading for Ratchet.

---

Sixshot felt sixteen shots collide into his armored tank mode.  The turret of 
his form turned, firing off two powerful purple laser blasts from his single 
cannon off at Ratchet.

---

Demon Wulf walked over to Flesh Ripper, who was next to Dark Claw.

"Brethren, incoming explosive projectiles with large mass." he refered to the 
missiles, firing an optic blast, blowing apart one of three incoming missiles 
from the CF.  Two missile shit the ground near Demon Wulf and Flesh Ripper, 
knocking them off their feet.

Dark Claw drove forward, firing off twenty rapid laser blasts at the 
Cybertronian Fire's missile launcher closest to him.  But his shots were 
intercepted by the blue shield of the CF.

---


Manterror heard the scream of missiles and looked down.  Four were heading 
straight for him.  He raised his arms, firing off three ion disks, one at 
three missiles.  He tried to dodge the fourth, but in vain.  The explosion 
sent him rocketing downward, on his way down he fired two ion disks down at 
Sky Lynx.

---

Injector took all twenty-five shots in the side, sending him flying sideways 
through the air with an almost cracked side.  He straightened out, charging 
down at Sideswipe.  "That's it!  We come here to have a pow-wow, and you go 
and mess with me!" he yelled, firing down four stinger missiles, two from 
each launcher, and twenty-five rapid optic blasts, all at Sideswipe.

---

Bumblebee slid to the side of one missile, another hitting him square in the 
chest and sending him flipping back.  He straightened out and cursed in 
Ancient Cybertronian.  He didn't even know what the curse meant, he just 
thought it sounded cool.  He flew forward full power, firing off 3 optic 
blasts and six stinger missiles at Sideswipe, three missiles from each weapon.

---

Double Punch watched the battle with growing interest.  "No is my time to 
shine." smiled the ex-assassin.  He raised both pinchers, each opening.  He 
fired one energy-signature seeking missile off at Orion, and another off at 
Sky Lynx, walking around holding in a laugh in his stealth mode, cloaked from 
view.

---

Ares' turret spun, firing off sixteen purple blasts of energy off at the 
Cybertronian Fire.  He would soon aid his comrades in the warrior to warrior 
combat.  He watched on his scanners as two of the remaining ten autoguns blew 
apart.  A barrage off autogun fire struck him, the shots lightly denting his 
armor.  The rest of his blasts stung into the shields.  He admired himself.  
Having four cannons to fire four shots.

---

Unitron's sensors detected Hot Rod.  Hot Rod firing on Alliance members.  He 
should've disobeyed Zardus' orders and killed him while he was in the base.  
That Feline female was inimate with Hot Rod last he remembered.  He'd have to 
kill her.  He powered up his engines, launching full force at Hot Rod.

"HOT ROD IS MINE!" he bellowed, as if he held command.  But, in reality, no 
one really knew he was dangerous, and they knew he held no real rank in the 
Alliance.  Only Serpentor knew he had destroyed the Newcomers.  
Self-destructed the base and assassinated Koga Shuko and his loyal followers. 
 But Unitron knew Serpentor would keep quiet.  

But, most had seen him take out a missile launcher and blow apart a part of 
the CF.  That had commanded some respect, so some stayed away.  The ones with 
higher authority ignored him though.

He transformed in mid air, landing on his feet, an energy blade in his left 
hand, a laser rifle in his right.  "Now, Slayer of Unicron.  So-called hero 
of the Third Cybertronian War.  You shall die at my hands NOW." he yelled, 
firing off three blasts from his rifle at Hot Rod's sternum.

---

Nemesis Enforcer touched down to the ground, hearing Unitron's command.  "Heh 
heh." he raised his rifle, firing off twenty-five rapid laser blasts at 
Ratchet, keeping his eye on the soon-to-come battle between Hot Rod and 
Unitron.
